currentPriority.reason: hyp-007 (related market arbitrage) just moved to testing - has clear Time POY test case. hyp-002 and hyp-005 need continued data collection. hyp-009 validated and graduated to strat-002.

engineStates.starved: Too few testable hypotheses (<3) - need to generate or unblock
engineStates.healthy: 3-10 testable hypotheses with good conviction spread
engineStates.saturated: Too many untested hypotheses (>10) - focus on testing not generating

needsAttention.detail: Confidence 5% - consider invalidating or gathering more evidence
